faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions
faq.question1: How do I apply for an e-KTP?
faq.answer1: To apply for an e-KTP (electronic ID card), log in to your account, navigate to the Services section, select the e-KTP service, and follow the steps to complete your application. You'll need to provide your personal information and upload required documents.
faq.question2: How long does it take to process my application?
faq.answer2: Processing times vary by service. Most applications are processed within 3-5 business days, but some services may take longer. You can check the estimated processing time for each service on its details page.
faq.question3: How can I track the status of my application?
faq.answer3: You can track your application status by going to the Applications section in your account. There, you'll see a list of all your applications and their current status. You'll also receive notifications when there are updates to your application.
faq.question4: What documents do I need to upload?
faq.answer4: Required documents vary by service. Common requirements include a scanned copy of your ID card (KTP), passport-sized photo, and proof of address. Specific requirements for each service are listed on the service application form.
faq.question5: How do I update my personal information?
faq.answer5: To update your personal information, go to the Profile section in your account. Click on the Edit Profile tab where you can update your details. After making changes, click Save Changes to update your information.
